lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. plans to issue a new edition of its manual giving agents more leeway to search databases, go through household trash or use surveillance teams to scrutinize people.

headline.seo: F.B.I. Giving Agents New Powers in Revised Manual
headline.main: F.B.I. Agents Get Leeway to Push Privacy Bounds
headline.sub: Searches of Databases and Household Trash Will Be Allowed;
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. AGENTS GET LEEWAY TO PUSH PRIVACY BOUNDS

snippet: The F.B.I. plans to issue a new edition of its manual giving agents more leeway to search databases, go through household trash or use surveillance teams to scrutinize people.
